subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Michelle Wie began her second year as a pro with a two-over-par 74, placing her seven strokes behind Annika Sorenstam and Lorena Ochoa at the Samsung World Championship.
snippet: Michelle Wie began her second year as a pro with a two-over-par 74, placing her seven strokes behind Annika Sorenstam and Lorena Ochoa at the Samsung World Championship.
